name: Food Fight (itch) (shadowCopy)
description:
Food Fight is a VR Game!!!!  A downloadable game for Windows Mixed reality and Oculus Quest

Food Fight uses four types of guns to hunt for food. You must hunt more food than AI players in one minute per round to go to the next round.

[Instructions]

  • Use the left controller to jump to the desired position.
  • Use the right controller to change direction.
  • Pick up the gun on the table and use the right controller to fire
  • Guns are unlocked based on the cumulative number of kills.

This is a playing video using laser gun.

playing video using ultimate gun.

[Credits]

  • Most of the 3d models and audio are from Kenney • Free game assets
  • Food model : Low Poly Food Pack | OpenGameArt.org
  • Sound Effects: 512 Sound Effects (8-bit style) | OpenGameArt.org
  • Background music: Free Music Tracks For Games | Audio Music | Unity Asset Store 8Bit Music Album - 051321 | Audio Music | Unity Asset Store
  • AI Material : Yughues Free Metal Materials | 2D Metals | Unity Asset Store

[Software Tools Used]

  • Unity https://unity.com/
  • Notepad ++ https://notepad-plus-plus.org/
  • Visual Studio Code Visual Studio Code - Code Editing. Redefined

[Update]

  • 2021-12-27
    Based on the comments, I uploaded a new android package (foodfight2.apk) with slightly different options.  Thanks.
